comment: /**  * Creates the error handler  *  * @param routeContext the route context  * @param processor the outer processor  * @return the error handler  * @throws Exception is thrown if the error handler could not be created  */
code: /**  * Creates the error handler  *  * @param routeContext the route context  * @param processor the outer processor  * @return the error handler  * @throws Exception is thrown if the error handler could not be created  */ Processor createErrorHandler(RouteContext routeContext, Processor processor) throws Exception.
